title: Best of The Herd for 06/21/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for 06/21/2019
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb recaps the NBA draft, when trades help both teams, and the latest Kawhi Leonard news. Also ESPN analyst Jay Bilas stops by to give his thoughts on the draft. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
